@bolkedebruin that is not true. Airflow webserver prepares a json dump of the whole dag (i.e all tasks) and sends it to UI. When you click a node in UI, it just uses that json information to render the modal dialog. So it can't be done 1 node at a time, unless you load the model dialog via ajax. For better understanding take a look at `nodeobj` variable from javascript console on tree view page of a dag.
